docs.snippet: The profound mistake of Reverend Wright's sermons is not that he spoke about racism in our society. It's that he spoke as if our society was static, as if no progress has been  made.     BARACK OBAMA,  on statements by  his pastor. [A14]...
docs.lead_paragraph: The profound mistake of Reverend Wright's sermons is not that he spoke about racism in our society. It's that he spoke as if our society was static, as if no progress has been made. BARACK OBAMA, on statements by his pastor. [A14]

docs.snippet: In case you're wondering who's responsible, I take responsibility.     PRESIDENT OBAMA, on the response to the oil spill in the Gulf of Mexico. [A1]...
docs.lead_paragraph: In case you're wondering who's responsible, I take responsibility. PRESIDENT OBAMA, on the response to the oil spill in the Gulf of Mexico. [A1]

docs.snippet: People in Massachusetts spoke. He's got to be part of that process.     PRESIDENT OBAMA, on the election of Scott Brown to the Senate and the future of health-care legislation. [A26]...
docs.lead_paragraph: People in Massachusetts spoke. He's got to be part of that process. PRESIDENT OBAMA, on the election of Scott Brown to the Senate and the future of health-care legislation. [A26]

docs.snippet: We have re-engaged the United Nations. We have paid our bills.      PRESIDENT OBAMA [A9]...
docs.lead_paragraph: We have re-engaged the United Nations. We have paid our bills. PRESIDENT OBAMA [A9]

docs.snippet: His ideas and ideals are stamped on scores of laws and reflected in millions of lives -- in seniors who know new dignity, in families that know new opportunity, in children who know education's promise, and in all who can pursue their dream in an ...
docs.lead_paragraph: His ideas and ideals are stamped on scores of laws and reflected in millions of lives -- in seniors who know new dignity, in families that know new opportunity, in children who know education's promise, and in all who can pursue their dream in an America that is more equal and more just -- including myself. PRESIDENT OBAMA on Senator Edward M. Kennedy. [A1]

docs.snippet: This plan will not save every home, but it will give millions of families resigned to financial ruin a chance to rebuild.     PRESIDENT OBAMA  [A1]...
docs.lead_paragraph: This plan will not save every home, but it will give millions of families resigned to financial ruin a chance to rebuild. PRESIDENT OBAMA [A1]

docs.snippet: For the sake of the Syrian people, the time has come for President Assad to step aside.     PRESIDENT OBAMA, calling for President Bashar al-Assad of Syria to step down. [A6]...
docs.lead_paragraph: For the sake of the Syrian people, the time has come for President Assad to step aside. PRESIDENT OBAMA, calling for President Bashar al-Assad of Syria to step down. [A6]

docs.snippet: America, it is time to focus on nation building here at home.     PRESIDENT OBAMA, declaring that the United States had achieved its main goals in Afghanistan. [A1]...
docs.lead_paragraph: America, it is time to focus on nation building here at home. PRESIDENT OBAMA, declaring that the United States had achieved its main goals in Afghanistan. [A1]

docs.snippet: The death of bin Laden marks the most significant achievement to date in our nation's effort to defeat Al Qaeda. But his death does not mark the end of our effort.      PRESIDENT OBAMA. [A1]...
docs.lead_paragraph: The death of bin Laden marks the most significant achievement to date in our nation's effort to defeat Al Qaeda. But his death does not mark the end of our effort. PRESIDENT OBAMA. [A1]

docs.snippet: That is not a way to run a government. I can't have our agencies making plans based on two-week budgets.      PRESIDENT OBAMA,...
docs.lead_paragraph: That is not a way to run a government. I can't have our agencies making plans based on two-week budgets. PRESIDENT OBAMA,
